widgets.onValue:
if(locals.switch == 6){
  send("/control", 1, 60, value)
  send("/control", 2, 61, value)
  send("/control", 3, 62, value)
  send("/control", 4, 63, value)
  send("/control", 5, 65, value)
  Object.keys(locals.faderState).forEach(k => locals.faderState[k] = value)
} else {
  if(locals.switch == 1) locals.faderState.vln1 = value
  else if(locals.switch == 2) locals.faderState.vln2 = value
  else if(locals.switch == 3) locals.faderState.vla = value
  else if(locals.switch == 4) locals.faderState.vc = value
  else if(locals.switch == 5) locals.faderState.vb = value

  send("/control", locals.preArgs[0], locals.preArgs[1], value)  
}

set("close_mic_state", locals.faderState)
widgets.onTouch:
locals.switch = get("CSSCloseSwitch")
locals.faderState = get("close_mic_state")

if (event.type == 'start') {
  if(locals.switch == 1) locals.preArgs = [1, 60]
  else if(locals.switch == 2) locals.preArgs = [2, 61]
  else if(locals.switch == 3) locals.preArgs = [3, 62]
  else if(locals.switch == 4) locals.preArgs = [4, 63]
  else if(locals.switch == 5) locals.preArgs = [5, 65]
}

widgets.label: %key
